title: Story of a book
brief_description: This program follows author Holling C. Holling through the process of creating “Pagoo”, the story of a hermit crab. Relates the steps involved in writing a book: the birth of an idea, doing the research, writing and rewriting, illustrating and printing. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
